reviewText:
This was good to use with 3rd, 4th and 5th grade students.  However the introductions were a little long, and did not hold the students' attention.  Including an instrumental track for independent practice would have been useful so that the
students could execute the dance moves as an actual dance.
Really current and just what we were looking for - easy to follow and learn
Doesn't help
Easy to follow.  Love it!
itt explained the dances well.
Taught by an Asian lady with no personality not even dressed in country attire. VERY disappointing, I couldn't get through it
First she was a little hard to understand her oriental accent. I felt she went a little fast & didn't repeat the steps enough or slow enough for a beginner.
this cd was was and was very well done as i expected, it was very well done i would recommend to others
After a rapid demonstration, which you can hardly understand, you are suppose to do a long involved dance. Good luck. Save your money.
good video for beginners, but only has a few basic dances on it.  Did not know what dances were on it when ordering. Good value
Thank you
Great for beginner to learn from... all that I expected !
I can't find any word that I can rate this dance the steps are so simple this is not the line dancing in looking for.
Having fun learning the dances
great to follow along with
My mom is 78 and she wanted to try line dancing as a form of exercise. I was pretty skeptical about whether she would like this . . . but as it turns out she loves it! :)
My shopping experience was excellent it was really good
dances done at Senior Center
Great!  Thank you!
was not what I thought it would be
